Chinese: 法律是下策，從君是上策
English: Law is bad policy, obeying Junzi is good policy.

Chinese: 未經過君子的認同而處在君子之上的人即為惡者
English: Anyone without Junzi's permission and trying to command or control Junzi is an evildoer.

Chinese: 面對謠言與威脅，君子不憂不懼
English: Junzi has neither anxiety and nor fear when faces rumors and threats.
The rank of a good person is upper than a non-good one.

Chinese: 唯有君子和品女是正途
English: Junzi or a girl of virtue is the only and right way to go.

Chinese: 玩H-Game不是判斷善惡的因子，H不是壞事
English: Playing H-Game is not the factor for judging good or evil, H is not a bad thing.

Chinese: 他人的謠言會使君子陷入危險時，君子會出來澄清，不會陷入危險時，可以選擇不用，此即為君子無所爭的實踐方法
English: When others' rumor will put Junzi in danger, he will clarify, if it won't, he can choose to do nothing. This is how to practice "Junzi has no contentions."

Chinese: 若人們尊重君子，君子言出必行，如果不是，言出可行
English: If people respect Junzi, Junzi does what he promised. If not, he may do as his will.

Chinese: 如果你是一個女生，你應該服從君子
English: If you are a female, you should obey Junzi.

Chinese: 善惡判斷在親子關係之上
English: Good and evil judgment is above the parent-child relationship.

Chinese: 在階級制度中，上位的人強要下位的人發生性關係不能算有罪，反過來的話有罪
English: In a class system, upper-class people may have sexual relations with lower class people as he/she wishes, it's not guilty. If the opposite, it's guilty.

Chinese: 君子指的是人有至上美德
English: Junzi means a man has supreme virtue.
Believing in Arina will get truths.
